definition[0]: a small amount of food eaten at the start of a meal before the main part
example[0]: We had soup as a starter, followed by steak.
definition[1]: a person, horse, car etc that is in a race when it starts
example[1]: Of the seven starters, only three finished the race.
definition[2]: someone who gives the signal for a race to begin
note[0]: under starterâ€™s orders (=about to begin the race)
